p: Heart sounds 89.7, central pulse 82.6, respiratory effort 92.8, observed 5 minutes 9.1 (absent in 35 cases), pain response 72.1, pupillary response 89.7, corneal reflex 6.1, time correct 74.4, date correct 80.6, signed 97.9, printed name 97.9, grade 81.6. In the 63 cases where duration of observation was documented, mean time of was 2.1Â minutes. There was only 1 instance of practice falling in line with current guidelines.
